name: Paidy Inc.
description: Provider of an online payment platform and loan service designed to give consumers peace of mind and increase conversion and sales. The company's platform offers to make cardless e-commerce payments and helps in peer-to-peer lending, enabling consumers to boost conversion and live profitably.
